citances.sentence: 1 On 13 December 2007 I dismissed an application by Mr Boensch seeking the removal of Mr Pascoe as his trustee ( Boensch v Pascoe [2007] FCA 1977). In a later judgment, on 27 March 2008, I made orders as to costs of those proceedings ( Boensch v Pascoe [2008] FCA 412).
